availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Evans (Louisville, Kentucky, steamboat pilot)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, steamboat pilot. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Evans. Married to Louisa Lentz Evans in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on April 26, 1852. Father of Mary Evans, Susan Evans, Sallie Evans, Julia Evans, Emma Evans, and Richard Evans. Resident of Louisville in 1850. Steamboat pilot in Louisville in 1858. Steamboat pilot in Louisville in 1860. Steamboat pilot in Louisville in 1861. Steamboat pilot in Louisville in 1865.
